definition: Pinggu rural district of Beijing, formerly Pinggu county
surname Ping
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
grain/corn
valley
surname Gu
Pinggu rural district of Beijing, formerly Pinggu county
former Pinggu county, now Pinggu rural district in Beijing,

sentences.english: The water was polluted mainly by the wastewater in Pinggu and Shunyi.
sentences.chinese: 平谷县污水以及顺义地区的养殖废水对水体造成污染。

sentences.english: Shangzhai site in Pinggu basin is an original place of Chinese environmental archaeology.
sentences.chinese: 上宅遗址所在的平谷盆地是中国环境考古策源地。

sentences.english: The Jingdong Grand Canyon and the hoodoo canyon are Pinggu County's natural scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 京东大峡谷与石林峡都是平谷县的自然风景区。

sentences.english: This area is abundant in water resource, which also makes Pinggu become one of the water supplies in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 并且平谷区水资源丰富，是北京重要的水源地所在地。

sentences.english: Such fantastic nature environment makes the largest peach farm in the world.
sentences.chinese: 平谷得天独厚的自然环境，孕育出了世界最大的桃园。

sentences.english: The authors explain a double layers and plane valley electron density profile.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种双层平谷电离层电子密度模式。

sentences.english: Study results indicate that the surface scarps of the Pinggu area are river erosion scarps.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果表明，平谷地区的地表陡坎是河流侵蚀陡坎。
